name: Fortran 95 Source Code File
summary: Learn about .F95 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Fortran 95 is the successor to the Fortran 90 programming language. There are some drawbacks to using F95 file extension as it is not recognized by all compilers. Also, Fortran 95 code can be written as fixed-form source so use the .F90 file to indicate free-form source code.

description: An F95 file is a source code file written in the Fortran 95 (F95) language, a numerical and scientific computing programming language. The file may be a program module or an entire program and can be compiled to generate an .EXE file.
